description:
A giant baby Nudenium is loose, Mr. Lewd Talk is friends with Handa`s mother, and Mikazuki returns to Shin-Yokohama.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Branium Senior / Handadan Dan Dan Dadan / La lune se montrera-t-elle à nouveau ?
